nodes.text: A model of landspeeder that was piloted by an astromech droid on the ice planet Maldo Kreis around 9 ABY. When the Mandalorian bounty hunter Din Djarin was hiring transport to his ship, the Razor Crest, from a Kubaz ferryman, he was first offered this droid-piloted landspeeder.

This speeder had a gold color scheme, two turbines at the rear, a rounded, curved front and four passenger seats. There was also an astromech socket for the astromech droid pilot. It was in a good and well-maintained condition, as opposed to the speeder that Din ultimately hired.
